name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of creative writing, emphasizing language, style, and structure. Students will be encouraged to explore various forms of creative writing, including poetry, drama, short stories, and more.

name: Writing Fiction I
description: This course introduces the student to the craft of writing fiction. Students will work on developing and refining the skills necessary to write creative works of fiction, including techniques for characterization, plot, setting, and dialogue.

name: Writing Fiction II
description: This course builds on the skills and knowledge acquired in Writing Fiction I. Students will focus on developing and refining their fiction writing skills in order to craft compelling stories. Students will practice the techniques of characterization, plot, setting, and dialogue.

name: Advanced Fiction Writing
description: This course is designed to help students hone their craft and take their fiction writing to the next level. Students will learn and practice techniques for literary analysis and will develop their own unique voice and style.
